subject: Colleges and Universities
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: For all the buzz surrounding his return to Detroit, Chris Webber is like a ghost in Ann Arbor. A missing link in Detroit, Webber is the invisible man at Michigan.
snippet: For all the buzz surrounding his return to Detroit, Chris Webber is like a ghost in Ann Arbor. A missing link in Detroit, Webber is the invisible man at Michigan.
